translations: 不认识的；不熟悉的；不知道的

sentences.sentence: I was then totally unacquainted with his poems.
sentences.translation: 那时我完全不知道他的诗。

sentences.sentence: Tom was at sea—a Great Seal was something which he was totally unacquainted with.
sentences.translation: 汤姆很茫然——御玺这东西，他根本就不认识。

sentences.sentence: I am at an unfavourable position in being conversationally unacquainted with English.
sentences.translation: 我由于不熟悉英语会话而处于不利地位。
